amendment.description: An amendment numbered 23 printed in Part C of House Report 117-125 to require proceedings for military commissions to be publicly available on the internet.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Schiff amendment (A012) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: The previous question was ordered on the amendment (A012) pursuant to the rule.
Amendment agreed to by House: On agreeing to the Schiff amendment (A012) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A012) offered by Mr. Schiff.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Schiff amendment (A012) Agreed to by voice vote.
